main.utils

Class WordTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.utils.WordTracker

  • public class WordTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a WordTracker that takes in words from a text file and adds them a BST with WordNodes. The WordTracker class can also store the BST in a binary file so that when it is instantiated again, it will re-populate the BST so that new words may be added.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String REPOSITORY_FILE
      The name of the binary file which will contain a BST of WordNodes
      private BSTree<WordNode> wordTree
      The BST that will hold WordNodes
